title: RSL LIFESTYLE
description: Built a MERN stack Travel and Tourism web app enabling bookings for hotels, cars, flights, and attractions. Enhanced frontend performance by 30% and integrated third-party APIs for seamless reservations. Developed an intuitive admin panel and collaborated cross-functionally to deliver timely solutions.

title: BEYOND CASA
description: Developed a MERN-based property listing platform with robust search filters and responsive design. Optimized backend management with an intuitive admin panel.

title: GADGETS BAZAAR
description: I developed a responsive Gadget Bazaar web application showcasing a wide range of gadgets. Built using HTML, CSS, JavaScript, SCSS, MUI, and React, the app delivers a seamless user experience.

title: MY PORTFOLIO
description: I have developed my portfolio site using React, HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. It showcases my skills, projects, and professional journey in a visually appealing and interactive manner.

title: TRAVEL WEBSITE
description: I developed Trick Travel, a responsive travel booking website using HTML, CSS, JavaScript, SCSS, MUI, and React. The site enables users to explore and book travel options seamlessly.

title: Crime Chronicles
description: Developed a responsive blog-style website titled Crime Chronicles, which provides insightful articles and stories related to crime. The website features a modern design with user-friendly navigation and content presentation.
